DOC.brief_summary: This pilot study intend establish efficacy 2 different dos epidural morphine pain management perineal trauma use multimodal analgesia well feasibility conduct large randomized clinical trial . Women traumatic vaginal delivery randomize 3 group 10 patient receive 2.5 mg epidural morphine , 1.25 mg epidural morphine , epidural saline . The primary outcome total opioid consumption breakthrough pain first 24 hour .
DOC.brief_title: Epidural Morphine Analgesia After Traumatic Vaginal Delivery
